com.freshbourne.io
Interface ResourceManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileResourceManager
public interface ResourceManager

ResourceManager reads and writes RawPage from and to a resource.

Method Summary
 RawPage addPage(RawPage page)
          create a new Page in the Resource.
 void close()

Method Detail

writePage

void writePage(RawPage page)
write the provided RawPage to the resource.

Parameters:
page - RawPage to write to the Resource. The ResourceManager and Id of the RawPage must be set.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the page id was not found or the ResourceManager was not equal to this ResourceManager

addPage

RawPage addPage(RawPage page)
create a new Page in the Resource. The method returns a new RawPage with the same backing buffer, but eventually with a different id. A new Page must be created since the id is immutable.

Parameters:
page - page to add
Returns:
new instance of page with ResourceManager and id set
Throws:
java.io.IOException

readPage

RawPage readPage(long pageId)
read the page with the given id

Parameters:
pageId - of the page to look up
Returns:
Page
Throws:
java.io.IOException

createPage

RawPage createPage()
Returns:
a new added RawPage
Throws:
java.io.IOException

removePage

void removePage(long pageId)
Parameters:
pageId - of the page to remove

pageSize

int pageSize()
Returns:
size of the pages in this resource

open

void open()
          throws java.io.IOException
Throws:
java.io.IOException

isOpen

boolean isOpen()

close

void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
Throws:
java.io.IOException

numberOfPages

int numberOfPages()
Returns:
the number of real pages, not header pages
